reset_energy.docs:
This action resets the total energy value of the pzemdc device with the given ID when executed.

*See also: [`pzemdc.reset_energy` Action](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pzemdc.html#pzemdc-reset-energy-action)*

address.docs:
**, int**: The address of the sensor if multiple sensors are attached to the same UART bus. You will need to set the address of each device manually. Defaults to `1`.

*See also: [Peacefair PZEM-00X DC Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pzemdc.html#configuration-variables)*

current.docs:
Use the current value of the sensor in amperes. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Peacefair PZEM-00X DC Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pzemdc.html#configuration-variables)*

energy.docs:
Use the energy value of the sensor in kWh. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Peacefair PZEM-00X DC Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pzemdc.html#configuration-variables)*

power.docs:
Use the power value of the sensor in watts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Peacefair PZEM-00X DC Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pzemdc.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [Peacefair PZEM-00X DC Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pzemdc.html#configuration-variables)*

voltage.docs:
Use the voltage value of the sensor in volts. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [Peacefair PZEM-00X DC Energy Monitor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pzemdc.html#configuration-variables)*
